title: 30 Days to a More Powerful Vocabulary
author: Wilfred J. Funk, Norman Lewis
description: A classic vocabulary‑building guide aimed at improving one’s command of English. Offers a 30‑day plan: daily exercises, word roots, pronunciation guides, and self‑tests to expand your vocabulary and sharpen communication skills. Useful for students, professionals, and anyone wanting to enrich their language skills. 272 pages in recent editions.
